Yes, they didn't have it all their own way, Alauddin Khilji is an example of someone who gave them a run for their money. The Mongols get a bad press but in reality probably weren't any more cruel than lots of other war bands around at this time. Life back then was very tribal and could be cruel and brutal anywhere, not just in the Mongol lands.
